EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for attending OSCON US 2017
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thanks for joining Pivotal at OSCON Austin 2017 <[[https://conferences.oreilly.com/oscon/oscon-tx]]>. We hope you learned something new about how enterprises are adopting cloud-native application architectures to drive modern, software experiences for their customers. If you’d like to talk to us about arranging a hands-on workshop day in your offices or at a nearby hotel, simply inquire here <[[https://pivotal.io/cloud-native-workshop]]> to begin a discussion.
In the meantime, if you are looking for spare capacity for CI builds, temporary development or test environments, check out Pivotal Web Services <[[http://run.pivotal.io/]]>, a great public cloud for running microservices Spring Framework (and .NET) on Cloud Foundry! Don’t forget to check out the free eBooks <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks]]> we have for you on Cloud Native applications, microservices, and much more.
In case you missed any of the conference talks, here’s a quick recap:
- Tutorial: Cloud-native Java <[[https://conferences.oreilly.com/oscon/oscon-tx/public/schedule/detail/56607]]> - Josh Long
- Tutorial: Building amazing cross-platform command-line apps in Go <[[https://conferences.oreilly.com/oscon/oscon-tx/public/schedule/detail/56760]]> - Ashley McNamara
- Branding is the most cringe worthy term you want to know about <[[https://conferences.oreilly.com/oscon/oscon-tx/public/schedule/detail/57034]]> - Neha Batra
- Scaling massive, real-time data pipelines with Go <[[https://conferences.oreilly.com/oscon/oscon-tx/public/schedule/detail/56357]]> - Jean de Klerk
- There is only Zuul: Configuring and customizing the Zuul API gateway <[[https://conferences.oreilly.com/oscon/oscon-tx/public/schedule/detail/57109]]> - Spencer Gibb
Hungry for the latest from Pivotal?
